edu.northwestern.at.utils.corpuslinguistics.textsummarizer
Interface TextSummarizer

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractTextSummarizer, DefaultTextSummarizer, SimpleTextSummarizer
public interface TextSummarizer

Defines an interface for summarizing a text.

Method Detail

summarize

<T extends java.lang.Comparable> java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> summarize(java.util.List<java.util.List<T>> sentences)
Summarize text.

Parameters:
sentences - Tokenized sentences to summarize.
Returns:
Summary of the input text. The maximum number of sentences returned is 10% of the original.

summarize

<T extends java.lang.Comparable> java.util.List<java.lang.Integer> summarize(java.util.List<java.util.List<T>> sentences,
                                                                             int summarySentences)
Summarize text.

Parameters:
sentences - Tokenized sentences to summarize.
summarySentences - Maximum number of sentences to return in the summary.
Returns:
Summary of the input text.
